t: 1 Chronicles 3
David’s Descendants
These*ln were David’s sons who were born to him in Hebron: Amnon*ln was the firstborn, by Ahinoam of Jezreel; Daniel*ln was born second, by Abigail of Carmel;
Absalom*ln son of Maacah, daughter of King Talmai of Geshur, was third; Adonijah*ln son of Haggith was fourth;
Shephatiah,*ln by Abital, was fifth; and*ln Ithream, by David’s wife Eglah, was sixth.
Six*ln sons were born to David in Hebron, where he reigned seven years and six months, and he reigned in Jerusalem thirty-three years.
These*ln sons were born to him in Jerusalem: Shimea,*ln Shobab, Nathan, and Solomon. These four were born to him by Bath-shua daughter of Ammiel.
David’s*ln other sons: Ibhar, Elishua, Eliphelet,
Nogah, Nepheg, Japhia,
Elishama, Eliada, and Eliphelet - nine sons.
These*ln were all David’s sons, with their sister Tamar, in addition to the sons by his concubines.
Judah’s Kings
Solomon’s*ln son was Rehoboam; his*ln son was Abijah, his son Asa, his*ln son Jehoshaphat,
his son Jehoram, his*ln son Ahaziah, his son Joash,
his*ln son Amaziah, his son Azariah, his*ln son Jotham,
his son Ahaz, his*ln son Hezekiah, his son Manasseh,
his*ln son Amon, and his son Josiah.
Josiah’s*ln sons: Johanan*ln was the firstborn, Jehoiakim second, Zedekiah*ln third, and Shallum fourth.
Jehoiakim’s*ln sons: his*ln sons Jeconiah and Zedekiah.
David’s Line after the Exile
The*ln sons of Jeconiah the captive: his*ln sons Shealtiel,
Malchiram, Pedaiah, Shenazzar, Jekamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.
Pedaiah’s*ln sons: Zerubbabel and Shimei. Zerubbabel’s*ln sons: Meshullam and Hananiah, with their sister Shelomith;
and five others - Hashubah, Ohel, Berechiah, Hasadiah, and Jushab-hesed.
Hananiah’s*ln descendants: Pelatiah, Jeshaiah, and the sons of Rephaiah, Arnan, Obadiah, and Shecaniah.
The*ln son of Shecaniah: Shemaiah. Shemaiah’s*ln sons: Hattush, Igal, Bariah, Neariah, and Shaphat - six.
Neariah’s*ln sons: Elioenai, Hizkiah, and Azrikam - three.
Elioenai’s*ln sons: Hodaviah, Eliashib, Pelaiah, Akkub, Johanan, Delaiah, and Anani - seven.
